languages.text: {n}Помолчав, воин тихо изрекает:{/n} "Чтобы не хоронить в снегах твое тело, эттфатер. Не из высокомерия Волки не допускают в свои дела смертных, а потому, что тяжек груз наших дел, и веет от них смертью. Подумай сам{mf||а}, сколь великая угроза может таиться там, где пропала целая стая Астартес. Достойно ли мне было рисковать тобой ради исполнения своих зароков?"

{n}After a few moments of silence, Ulfar says quietly,{/n} "So I did not have to bury your body in the snow, Aett-Vater. It is not out of arrogance that Wolves do not allow mortals into our affairs, but because the burden of those deeds is heavy, and they reek of death. Just consider what kind of threat you could have been facing. In a place where an entire pack of Astartes has disappeared. If I had risked you for the sake of fulfilling my vows — would that have been worthy of me?"
languages.original_text: {n}Помолчав, воин тихо изрекает:{/n} "Чтобы не хоронить в снегах твое тело, эттфатер. Не из высокомерия Волки не допускают в свои дела смертных, а потому, что тяжек груз наших дел, и веет от них смертью. Подумай сам{mf||а}, сколь великая угроза может таиться там, где пропала целая стая Астартес. Достойно ли мне было рисковать тобой ради исполнения своих зароков?"

traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}乌尔法沉默片刻，低声开了口。{/n}“因为我不想在雪地中，亲手埋葬你的尸体，狼领。狼群不允许凡人插手我们的事务，这并非出于傲慢，而是因为那些事务过于危险，充斥着死亡的气息。想想看，一整支阿斯塔特修士都在那个地方全军覆没，那里可能会隐藏着怎样的危险？如果我仅仅是为了实现诺言，就害得你身处险境，这还算什么太空野狼？”
languages.original_text: {n}After a few moments of silence, Ulfar says quietly,{/n} "So I did not have to bury your body in the snow, Aett-Vater. It is not out of arrogance that Wolves do not allow mortals into our affairs, but because the burden of those deeds is heavy, and they reek of death. Just consider what kind of threat you could have been facing. In a place where an entire pack of Astartes has disappeared. If I had risked you for the sake of fulfilling my vows — would that have been worthy of me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法沉默片刻，低声开了口。{/n}“因为我不想在雪地中，亲手埋葬你的尸体，狼领。狼群不允许凡人插手我们的事务，这并非出于傲慢，而是因为那些事务过于危险，充斥着死亡的气息。想想看，一整支阿斯塔特修士都在那个地方全军覆没，那里可能会隐藏着怎样的危险？如果我仅仅是为了实现诺言，就害得你身处险境，这还算什么太空野狼？”
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}少しの沈黙をはさんで、ウルファーは静かに話す。{/n}「お前の身体を雪に埋めるわけにはいかない、アエット＝ヴァテル。狼が自分たちの問題に人間を連れてこないのは傲慢ゆえじゃない。荷が重すぎるし、死の臭いがするからだ。どんな脅威に直面したか考えても見ろ。アスタルテスの群れがごっそり消えちまった場所だ。俺の誓いを果たすためにお前を危険にさらすなど…俺にそこまでの価値はないだろ？」
languages.original_text: {n}After a few moments of silence, Ulfar says quietly,{/n} "So I did not have to bury your body in the snow, Aett-Vater. It is not out of arrogance that Wolves do not allow mortals into our affairs, but because the burden of those deeds is heavy, and they reek of death. Just consider what kind of threat you could have been facing. In a place where an entire pack of Astartes has disappeared. If I had risked you for the sake of fulfilling my vows — would that have been worthy of me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}少しの沈黙をはさんで、ウルファーは静かに話す。{/n}「お前の身体を雪に埋めるわけにはいかない、アエット＝ヴァテル。狼が自分たちの問題に人間を連れてこないのは傲慢ゆえじゃない。荷が重すぎるし、死の臭いがするからだ。どんな脅威に直面したか考えても見ろ。アスタルテスの群れがごっそり消えちまった場所だ。俺の誓いを果たすためにお前を危険にさらすなど…俺にそこまでの価値はないだろ？」
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}Tras unos momentos de silencio, Ulfar responde con voz queda:{/n} «Para no tener que enterrar su cuerpo en la nieve, Aett-Vater. Si los Lobos no permitimos que los mortales participen en nuestros asuntos, no es por arrogancia sino porque suponen una carga muy pesada y apestan a muerte. Piense en las amenazas que podrían acechar en un lugar donde una jauría entera de Astartes ha desaparecido. Si pusiera en peligro su vida para cumplir mis juramentos, ¿eso sería digno?».
languages.original_text: {n}After a few moments of silence, Ulfar says quietly,{/n} "So I did not have to bury your body in the snow, Aett-Vater. It is not out of arrogance that Wolves do not allow mortals into our affairs, but because the burden of those deeds is heavy, and they reek of death. Just consider what kind of threat you could have been facing. In a place where an entire pack of Astartes has disappeared. If I had risked you for the sake of fulfilling my vows — would that have been worthy of me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras unos momentos de silencio, Ulfar responde con voz queda:{/n} «Para no tener que enterrar su cuerpo en la nieve, Aett-Vater. Si los Lobos no permitimos que los mortales participen en nuestros asuntos, no es por arrogancia sino porque suponen una carga muy pesada y apestan a muerte. Piense en las amenazas que podrían acechar en un lugar donde una jauría entera de Astartes ha desaparecido. Si pusiera en peligro su vida para cumplir mis juramentos, ¿eso sería digno?».
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}Après quelques instants de silence, Ulfar vous répond à voix basse :{/n} « Afin de ne pas avoir à enterrer votre corps dans la neige, aett-vater. Ce n'est pas par arrogance que les Loups évitent de mêler les mortels à leurs affaires, mais parce que le fardeau que nous portons est lourd et il empeste la mort. Imaginez les périls que vous auriez dû affronter en un lieu où une meute entière d'Astartes a disparu. Aurait-il été noble de ma part de risquer votre vie dans le seul but d'honorer mon serment ? »
languages.original_text: {n}After a few moments of silence, Ulfar says quietly,{/n} "So I did not have to bury your body in the snow, Aett-Vater. It is not out of arrogance that Wolves do not allow mortals into our affairs, but because the burden of those deeds is heavy, and they reek of death. Just consider what kind of threat you could have been facing. In a place where an entire pack of Astartes has disappeared. If I had risked you for the sake of fulfilling my vows — would that have been worthy of me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Après quelques instants de silence, Ulfar vous répond à voix basse :{/n} « Afin de ne pas avoir à enterrer votre corps dans la neige, aett-vater. Ce n'est pas par arrogance que les Loups évitent de mêler les mortels à leurs affaires, mais parce que le fardeau que nous portons est lourd et il empeste la mort. Imaginez les périls que vous auriez dû affronter en un lieu où une meute entière d'Astartes a disparu. Aurait-il été noble de ma part de risquer votre vie dans le seul but d'honorer mon serment ? »
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}Nach einer kurzen Stille sagt Ulfar leise:{/n} "Damit ich nicht Eure Leiche im Schnee begraben musste, Aett-Vater. Es ist keine Arroganz, dass Wölfe keine Sterblichen an ihren Angelegenheiten beteiligen, sondern weil deren Bürde schwer ist und immer nach Tod riecht. Bedenkt nur, welcher Bedrohung Ihr möglicherweise ausgesetzt worden wärt. An einem Ort, wo ein ganzes Rudel Astartes verschwunden ist. Hätte ich Euer Leben riskiert, um meinen Schwur zu erfüllen – wäre das meiner würdig gewesen?"
languages.original_text: {n}After a few moments of silence, Ulfar says quietly,{/n} "So I did not have to bury your body in the snow, Aett-Vater. It is not out of arrogance that Wolves do not allow mortals into our affairs, but because the burden of those deeds is heavy, and they reek of death. Just consider what kind of threat you could have been facing. In a place where an entire pack of Astartes has disappeared. If I had risked you for the sake of fulfilling my vows — would that have been worthy of me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer kurzen Stille sagt Ulfar leise:{/n} "Damit ich nicht Eure Leiche im Schnee begraben musste, Aett-Vater. Es ist keine Arroganz, dass Wölfe keine Sterblichen an ihren Angelegenheiten beteiligen, sondern weil deren Bürde schwer ist und immer nach Tod riecht. Bedenkt nur, welcher Bedrohung Ihr möglicherweise ausgesetzt worden wärt. An einem Ort, wo ein ganzes Rudel Astartes verschwunden ist. Hätte ich Euer Leben riskiert, um meinen Schwur zu erfüllen – wäre das meiner würdig gewesen?"
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, bir süre sessiz kaldıktan sonra kısık sesle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Bedenini karlara gömmek zorunda kalmamak için Aett-Vater. Kurtların işlerine ölümlüleri dâhil etmemesinin sebebi, kendini beğenmişlik değildir. Bu görevler çok ağırdır, ölüm kokarlar. Karşına çıkabilecek tehlikeleri bir düşünsene. Koca bir Astartes sürüsünün kaybolduğu yerde hem de. Yeminimi yerine getireceğim diye hayatını riske atsaydım bu soysuzluk olmaz mıydı?"
languages.original_text: {n}After a few moments of silence, Ulfar says quietly,{/n} "So I did not have to bury your body in the snow, Aett-Vater. It is not out of arrogance that Wolves do not allow mortals into our affairs, but because the burden of those deeds is heavy, and they reek of death. Just consider what kind of threat you could have been facing. In a place where an entire pack of Astartes has disappeared. If I had risked you for the sake of fulfilling my vows — would that have been worthy of me?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, bir süre sessiz kaldıktan sonra sessizce konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Senin bedenini karlara gömmek zorunda kalmamak için Aett-Vater. Kurtların işlerine başkalarını dâhil etmemesinin sebebi kendini beğenmişlik değildir. Bu görevlerin ağırlığı fazladır ve ölüm kokarlar. Karşına çıkabilecek tehlikeleri bir düşünsene. Koca bir Astartes sürüsünün kaybolduğu yerde hem de. Yeminimi yerine getirmek için senin hayatını riske atsaydım bunu onuruma yedirebilir miydim?"
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked
